jsky.science
Interface Spectrum

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, ReplaceablePropertyChangeListener, ScienceObjectModel, ScienceObjectNodeModel, Wavelength1DModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
Spectrum1DArray
public interface Spectrum
extends Wavelength1DModel

covering abstract class for Spectra distribution classes

This code was developed by NASA, Goddard Space Flight Center, Code 587 for the Scientist's Expert Assistant (SEA) project for Next Generation Space Telescope (NGST).

Method Summary
 double getTotalCounts()
          returns total counts across the spectrum, units should be electrons / second / cm^2 (cm^2 is per centimeter squared of mirror area)
 boolean isNormalizationRequired()
          returns true if the spectrum "must" be normalized
